description: Classic north Italian risotto with mushrooms.

directions.step: Saute the minced onions in olive oil.
When the onions begin to color, add the sliced mushrooms.
Cover them and let them cook for about 15 minutes stirring occasionally.
Add the wine, ginger and let evaporate.
Add the raw rice and let it absorb all the liquid.
When the rice dries out and shines, add a ladle of hot stock and stir constantly until it is completely absorbed.
Repeat until the rice becomes translucent with a little white grain visible at the center. (This usually takes about 30 minutes.)
Add a dash of cream, some parmesan, season, mix and put in plates.
Sprinkle Parmesan and grind pepper over the top and serve.
